meanings.definition: Treat (a substance) with sulphur or sulphur compounds.
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith was sulphurising the iron to make it stronger.
meanings.sent2: The scientist is sulphurising the compound to study its properties.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally ended up sulphurising the soup instead of adding salt.
meanings.sent4: The artist's creativity was sulphurising the traditional painting techniques.
meanings.sent5: The farmer's method of sulphurising the soil yielded healthier crops.

meanings.definition: To undergo a chemical reaction involving the addition of sulphur.
meanings.sent1: The metal is sulphurising when exposed to the elements for too long.
meanings.sent2: The organic matter is sulphurising due to the presence of sulphur bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The potion in the wizard's cauldron started sulphurising unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: The old book's pages were slowly sulphurising over time.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere was sulphurising as the volcano erupted nearby.
